Package org.drombler.acp.core.action.spi

SPI for declarative actions, menus and toolbars support based on Drombler ACP.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ActionFactory<T>
    An action factory.
    ApplicationToolBarContainerProvider<T,B>
    The application tool bar container provider.
    MenuBarMenuContainerProvider<MenuItem,Menu extends MenuItem>
    The provider which provides the menu bar based menu container.
    MenuFactory<T>
    A menu factory to create a GUI toolkit specific menu component from a MenuDescriptor.
    MenuItemContainer<MenuItem,Menu extends MenuItem,F extends org.drombler.acp.core.action.MenuItemSupplierFactory<MenuItem,F>>
    A menu item container.
    MenuItemContainerListener<MenuItem,Menu extends MenuItem>
    A listener for MenuItemContainerMenuEvents .
    MenuItemFactory<T,A>
    A menu item factory to create a GUI toolkit specific menu item component from an action.
    MenuItemRootContainer<MenuItem,Menu extends MenuItem,F extends org.drombler.acp.core.action.MenuItemSupplierFactory<MenuItem,F>>
    A menu item root container.
    MenuMenuItemContainerFactory<MenuItem,Menu extends MenuItem>
    A factory to create (sub-)menu component based MenuItemContainers.
    SeparatorMenuItemFactory<S>
    A separator menu item factory to create a GUI toolkit specific separator menu item component.
    ToggleActionFactory<T>
    A toggle action factory.
    ToggleMenuItemFactory<MenuItem,ToggleMenuItem extends MenuItem,ToggleAction>
    A toggle menu item factory to create a GUI toolkit specific toggle menu item component from a toggle action.
    ToolBarButtonFactory<B,A>
    A tool bar button factory to create a GUI toolkit specific tool bar button from an action.
    ToolBarContainer<T,B>
    A tool bar container, which manages tool bars and tool bar buttons.
    ToolBarContainerListener<ToolBar,ToolBarButton>
    A ToolBarContainer listener.
    ToolBarFactory<T>
    A tool bar factory to create a GUI toolkit specific tool bar.
    ToolBarToggleButtonFactory<B,A>
    A tool bar toggle button factory to create a GUI toolkit specific tool bar toggle button from a toggle action.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractMenuEntryDescriptor<MenuItem,F extends org.drombler.acp.core.action.MenuItemSupplierFactory<MenuItem,F>>
    A base class for menu entry descriptors.
    AbstractMenuItemContainer<MenuItem,Menu extends MenuItem,F extends org.drombler.acp.core.action.MenuItemSupplierFactory<MenuItem,F>>
    An abstract base class for MenuItemContainers.
    AbstractMenuItemContainerMenuItemEvent<MenuItem,Menu extends MenuItem,M extends MenuItem>
    A base class for MenuItemContainer menu item events.
    AbstractMenuItemRootContainer<MenuItem,Menu extends MenuItem,F extends org.drombler.acp.core.action.MenuItemSupplierFactory<MenuItem,F>>
    A base class for menu item root containers.
    AbstractToolBarContainerEvent<ToolBar,ToolBarButton,T>
    An abstract base class for ToolBarContainer events.
    ActionDescriptor<T>
    An action descriptor.
    ActionRegistry<D extends ActionDescriptor<?>>
    An OSGi-based action registry.
    ActionResolutionManager<T>
    An action resolution manager which manages entries, which depend on actions which have not yet been registered.
    MenuDescriptor<MenuItem,F extends org.drombler.acp.core.action.MenuItemSupplierFactory<MenuItem,F>>
    A menu descriptor.
    MenuEntryDescriptor<MenuItem,F extends org.drombler.acp.core.action.MenuItemSupplierFactory<MenuItem,F>>
    A menu entry descriptor.
    MenuItemContainerListenerAdapter<MenuItem,Menu extends MenuItem>
    A simple implementation of MenuItemContainerListener, which does nothing by default.
    MenuItemContainerMenuEvent<MenuItem,Menu extends MenuItem>
    A MenuItemContainer menu event.
    MenuItemContainerMenuItemEvent<MenuItem,Menu extends MenuItem>
    A MenuItemContainer menu item event.
    ToggleActionDescriptor<T>
    A toggle action descriptor.
    ToggleMenuEntryDescriptor<MenuItem,ToggleMenuItem extends MenuItem,F extends org.drombler.acp.core.action.MenuItemSupplierFactory<MenuItem,F>>
    A toggle menu entry desciptor.
    ToolBarContainerListenerAdapter<ToolBar,ToolBarButton>
    An base class for ToolBarContainerListeners.
    ToolBarContainerToolBarButtonEvent<ToolBar,ToolBarButton>
    A ToolBarContainer tool bar button event.
    ToolBarContainerToolBarEvent<ToolBar,ToolBarButton>
    A ToolBarContainer tool bar event.
    ToolBarDescriptor
    A tool bar descriptor.
    ToolBarEntryDescriptor
    A tool bar entry descriptor.
    ToolBarToggleEntryDescriptor
    A tool bar toggle entry descriptor.

Package org.drombler.acp.core.action.spi Description

SPI for declarative actions, menus and toolbars support based on Drombler ACP.
